tweet_text: @AaronWherry While running for party leader EOT told us that he would not move CPC to the centre (unlike MacKay). Then he campaigned like a red tory though his party seemed to have moved further right. This cynical reversal damaged trust & created confusion about how he would actually govern.
text_en: While running for party leader EOT told us that he would not move CPC to the centre (unlike MacKay). Then he campaigned like a red tory though his party seemed to have moved further right. This cynical reversal damaged trust & created confusion about how he would actually govern.
